com.viaoa.annotation

Annotation Type OATriggerMethod


  • @Documented
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OATriggerMethod
    Describes an OAObject trigger method. This is used to avoid creating "far reaching" property path listeners, where a hub is listening to a propertyPath of objects. Instead, a change to the end of a property path will then loop through and invoke the trigger for all objects that are in the reversing of the property path. Example: an order discount is dependent on the emp.dep.company.discount instead of each order listening to the propPath, oa will loop through all emps of a company if the discount is changed. method signature will be: public void nameTrigger(HubEvent hubEvent) example: @OATriggerMethod(onlyUseLoadedData=true, runOnServer=true, runInBackgroundThread=true, properties= {"test"}) Note: the trigger method is not called if hub.isfetching, or oaobj.isLoading

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean onlyUseLoadedData 
      String[] properties 
      boolean runInBackgroundThread 
      boolean runOnServer 

    • Element Detail

      • properties

        public abstract String[] properties
        Returns:
        Property paths that will automatically call this method when the propPath is changed.
        Default:
        {}

      • onlyUseLoadedData

        public abstract boolean onlyUseLoadedData
        Returns:
        if true (default), then triggers are only made on objects that are in memory.
        Default:
        true

      • runOnServer

        public abstract boolean runOnServer
        Returns:
        if true (default), then only run on the server.
        Default:
        true

      • runInBackgroundThread

        public abstract boolean runInBackgroundThread
        Returns:
        If true, then this will be ran in another thread. Otherwise false (default), run in the current thread.
        Default:
        false
